title: Oilbert's Adventure
description: An engaging jump and run game featuring a charming VW Bus. Built with JavaScript and Canvas API for smooth animations and gameplay.

title: Melod.ai - Karaoke App
description: Comprehensive karaoke solution using machine learning to extract vocals and lyrics from any song. Features real-time voice processing and scoring.

title: Skiing Aftermovie 2024 - Fun Version
description: Creative edit of our annual skiing trip featuring AI-generated music. This fun version captures the playful moments and highlights of our alpine adventure.

title: Skiing Aftermovie 2024 - Epic Version
description: Cinematic recreation of our skiing trip to Flachau. This epic version features stunning drone shots and professionally mixed audio for an immersive experience.

title: Infected - Short Film
description: Action-packed short film shot over 48 hours with extensive post-production. Features practical effects, choreographed fight scenes, and original scoring.

title: Voll-O-Meter
description: PWA that tracks blood alcohol levels based on consumed drinks. Features real-time decay calculations, drink customization, and offline functionality.

title: Exception - Short Film
description: Short film created during a 48-hour film hackathon. Features experimental storytelling techniques and creative problem-solving under tight constraints.

title: Skiing 2022 Aftermovie
description: Documentary-style aftermovie of our trip to the Austrian Alps in Zillertal. Captures both the breathtaking scenery and the camaraderie of our group.

title: Sailing 2022 Aftermovie
description: Nautical adventure captured across IJsselmeer in the Netherlands. This film combines sweeping waterscapes with intimate moments to tell our journey's story.

title: Kolpingtheater Ramsen
description: Complete website and ticketing system for a local theater in Ramsen. Built with Vue.js frontend and Express.js backend with SQLite database for secure ticket reservations.

title: JP Poolparty Website
description: Event registration and music request platform with admin dashboard. Built using PaperCSS for the frontend and Express.js with SQLite for the backend.

title: Palatina Films
description: My first professional website incorporating custom visual effects. Used Materializecss for the frontend and integrated After Effects animations for dynamic content.

title: Poolparty 2021 Aftermovie
description: Vibrant celebration of our annual poolparty featuring hot tubs and cocktail bars. Employs creative transitions and color grading to enhance the summer atmosphere.

title: Skiing 2020 Aftermovie
description: Winter adventure documentary set in Bad Gastein, Austria. Features slow-motion sequences and drone footage capturing the majesty of the Alpine landscape.

title: Poolparty 2020 Aftermovie
description: Sun-soaked celebration of friendship and summer vibes. Employs handheld camera techniques and warm color grading to create an authentic, nostalgic feel.

title: Bodensee 2020 Aftermovie
description: Lake Constance adventure featuring watersports and exploration. Combines underwater footage with above-water perspectives for a complete visual experience.

title: Skiing 2019 Aftermovie
description: Fast-paced mini-documentary of a weekend trip to Feldberg in the Black Forest. Focuses on capturing authentic moments despite the brief timeframe.

title: Die Chroniken von Selantis
description: Epic fantasy trilogy with extensive worldbuilding and visual effects. I served as VFX artist and actor, contributing to creating this imaginative universe.

title: Sailing 2019 Aftermovie
description: Our inaugural sailing adventure through the IJsselmeer in the Netherlands. Documents both the challenges and triumphs of learning to sail as a team.

title: Spyfall
description: Digital adaptation of the popular Spyfall party game with Hot-Seat mode. Built as a Progressive Web App with minimalist design and offline capabilities.

title: Corona Board
description: Interactive COVID-19 data dashboard using Johns Hopkins University datasets. Features real-time updates, trend visualization, and regional comparisons.
